body:
@mrs.lolicon-san : so it's a good thing to show a mc dominating Loli in Japan?? I mean, I thought people will like "time to arrest another lolicon/paedophile again" something like that??

And just for discussion... What the "good thing" you talking about??
Her last swimsuit is literally the reason I have a thing for swimsuits, 7th in the series for your information

"Available on DMM" - the Japanese sure knows what their citizens needs are. / IRL talk i means, this particular Author really showing his Reader what was on his mind if he was the Male MC dominating a Submissive Loli like her, but its only one sided, not so much so of a two parties like most other Authors would trying to portrayed their works as. So i guess they are special then.
The fact that middle aged rapist’s turtle is so small is rather bothersome
